FilterItemPortable.Name: Padrão
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="TIPO"> <FieldDefinitionName>TabFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>1</Value> <Text>Pessoa Física</Text> </ListItem> <ListItem> <Value>2</Value> <Text>Pessoa Jurídica</Text> </ListItem> <ListItem> <Value>3</Value> <Text>Pessoa Física Exterior</Text> </ListItem> <ListItem> <Value>4</Value> <Text>Pessoa Jurídica Exterior</Text> </ListItem> <ListItem> <Value>5</Value> <Text>Espólio</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="CATEGORIACLIENTE"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>em</Name> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
